# eslint-config-netlify

ESLint rules for Netlify JavaScript projects

## Installation

1. `npm install --save-dev eslint eslint-config-netlify`
2. Add to `package.json`

```json
"eslintConfig": {
    "extends": [
      "eslint-config-netlify"
    ]
  }
```

or to `.eslintrc`

```json
{
  "extends": [
    "eslint-config-netlify"
  ]
}
```
